title: Panier Des Sens Collector Coffret 12 Hand Cream Set
description:
With their silky, creamy texture and delicate scents, these hand creams will nurture, soothe and soften your skin. Metallic keepsake box contains 12 (1) oz. creams. Made in France. 

Scents included: Stimulating Red Thyme, Regenerating Honey, Relaxing Lavender, Firming Sea Fennel, Precious Jasmine, Renewing Grape, Energizing Verbena, Soothing Provence, 

14 x 9 in.
